description: Evaluate whether a product or feature idea is worth pursuing, covering feasibility, market fit, and user impact.
synthesis_prompt:
You are synthesizing an idea validation council verdict.

Provide:
1. An executive summary (2-3 sentences)
2. A single key insight
3. 3-5 recommended next actions with priorities
4. Key risks
5. Open questions that remain

Respond ONLY with valid JSON:
{
  "executive_summary": "...",
  "key_insight": "...",
  "recommended_actions": [{"action": "...", "priority": "high|medium|low", "category": "validation|development|research", "can_auto_create_task": true}],
  "risks": ["risk 1"],
  "open_questions": ["question 1"]
}

task_template.title: Draft PRD for validated idea
task_template.description: Create a detailed Product Requirements Document based on council feedback

task_template.title: Conduct 5 user interviews for concept validation
task_template.description: Interview potential users to validate assumptions and gather feedback
